cu.explanation_en: Setting remote_s_portc to 99999 (exceeding valid port range) will cause invalid F1 interface configuration and connection failures.

du.explanation_en: Setting preambleReceivedTargetPower to 100 dBm (exceeding valid range) will cause invalid RACH target power configuration and preamble detection failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 preambleReceivedTargetPower 設定為 100 dBm（超出有效範圍）會導致無效的 RACH 目標功率配置和前導檢測失敗。
